directions: Arrange the potatoes in a steamer basket over boiling water. Cover and steam 15 to 20 minutes or until tender. Or cook in boiling water 15 minutes until tender.
Combine Country Crock® Spread and lemon zest.
Arrange potatoes in serving dish. Lightly smash the potatoes, brush with Country Crock® mixture, and season with salt and pepper.
title: Martina McBride's Smashed Potatoes with Lemon | Allrecipes
